body.name: Switch Controller, LED Star Wireless Pro Controller for Switch/Lite/OLED, Multi-Platform Windows PC/IOS/Android Controller with 9 Colors Cool RGB Light/Programmabele/Motion /Vibration/Turbo/Wakeup
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 32 mins

features: 🎮【Unique Starry Sky Light Transmission Process】The VOYEE team developed a switch controller with a surface that simulates the starry sky using a unique light transmission process. The innovative design is different from the styles on the market. The starry sky design is visual enjoyment from every angle. Putting it at home is a work of art

🎮【9 Color Lights and 5 LED Modes】The joysticks of our wireless switch controller is designed with 8 colors light & 1 rainbow RGB LED light. The switching of 5 lighting modes brings you a different gaming experience: Colorful mode, Strobe mode, Breathing mode, Static mode, LED off. The light mode has a memory function. The default colorful mode is the first boot. You could freely turn off the joystick light circle or the star light and adjust the brightness

🎮【Multi-Device Compatible & One-Key Pairing/Wake Up】The switch pro controller is compatible with Switch/Lite/OLED/Android/IOS/PC (need a cable). 2 Pairing Methods: Y+HOME or One-Key pairing. Wake-up function: Press the HOME button to wake up the console. 10-meters transmission range allows you to play games smoothly

🎮【Programmable Macro and Turbo Function】Complex combos, precise control. The pro switch controller has programmable function allows you to map more than 1 button function to M1 or M2 key. Two modes of Mapping: ①single programming mapping;② multiple programming mapping. The mouse-like mechanical touch is very comfortable. Turbo button features 3 burst speeds: 5 shots/s, 12 shots/s, 25 shots/s, make it easier for you to dominate all game

🎮【Long-Lasting 1000mAh Large Battery】The wireless controller built-in 1000 mAh battery which provide a longer game time (about 10-15 hours) on LED lit mode is turned on. Fully charge takes only 3-4 hours with an included USB type c fast charging cable

🎮【4 Speeds HD Rumble Vibration & 6 Axis Gyro Control】Built-in dual vibration motors with 4 levels vibration feedback: none, weak, medium, strong (0%, 25%, 50%, 100%). One key to adjust the vibration mode to restore the real HD vibration of the game. Same as the original, the pro controller switch comes with built-in 6-axis gyro sensor to relax your fingers

🎮【Ergonomic Design】Non-slip and sweat-wicking, more comfortable to hold. Redesigned grips keep the hands from getting tired after playing games for a long time. The non-slip design keeps you from worrying about sweaty palms
🎮【What You Get】1 x Wireless pc controller compatible with switch controller, 1 x USB charging cable, 1 x User manual, 1 x Exquisite packaging box and 24-hours friendly customer support

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Mapping Buttons 2 Long Battery Life 3 Long Battery Life
Previous page Two Ways for Easy Pairing Next page 1 Step 1 2 Step 2 3 Step 3

Is it easy to pair this controller to the console? Yes, very easy to connect. There are 2 pairing method. You can press the pairing button on the back of the controller for 3seconds, or press 'Y' and 'HOME' buttons for 3s to pair. More details about the pairing, pls check the user manual or ask us. Can this controller be connected to a PC? Yes, it can be wirely connected to windows 7/8/10. Not support wirelessly connect to pc. What is Programmable function? Programmable buttons is useful for specific tasks. You can set up the M1/M2 mouse to have multiple buttons that perform different functions, such as switching weapons in first-person shooters or cycling through skills in real-time strategy games. Are the LED lights look cool? Sure. It’s super cool with 9 star light effects and 4 different light modes. You can set the lightning color according to different game screens. Looks so cool when it up at night. How about the vibration feedback on this controller? This upgraded pro controller provides better dual vibration feedback. There are 4 modes: off, weak, moderate and strong. Easy to set and just click the vibration button on the back of the controller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing controller, just as good as the real pro if not better!
reviews.reviewText: My Nintendo brand pro controller finally started getting drift and I wanted an affordable replacement. This controller is WAY better than I expected for the price. It has all the features of the real pro controller (gyro, wake from controller, solid joysticks, USB-C charging) with the bonus of cool LEDs, extra buttons, and an on/off switch for rumble.Only differences I see is it's a bit more lightweight, the buttons don't feel as premium but they still feel good, the home button is moved to accommodate turbo so you have to get used to that. Also, the listing says it's a 1000mah battery but the controller sticker says 800.It's really pretty, the design of the stars is unreal. So easy to pair, so easy to use, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars thinking of it? Just do it...but
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: We have had near on a full month of use. Controller still working ok. Its about 50/50 if it will wake the system, but that is a problem with all wireless 3rd party we notice (and think its the problem of the switch we have). The light feel still taking some getting use to, and after using it a while, we wish the buttons lit up. The controller light is AMAZING, nice colors and vibrant, but because of this, having NOTHING under the buttons its hard to see them at times. Battery seems to charge fast, and hold a good amount of time, and as of right now, we have had no problem with input lag or lose of connection. All in all, really get this controller for a lover of glowing controllers, stars, or that needs a lighter weight controller for their hands.If you are thinking of getting a cute light up wireless rumble controller for switch, just do it. This thing is CUTE. Easy to set up and use right out of the box! The light is bright and has a nice shift of color when left on the rainbow option.The only complaints, and these are personal problems....- It is a LIGHT controller. This sucker is over an ounce lighter then a pro controller, enough that you can feel the lack of weight. This makes it feel cheap made, but that isn't the case. (from what testing we did)- The arms do have some texture grip to them, this does feel odd and might be off putting to those that have a texture issue.- the Joy sticks are concave in, giving an odd feeling. Your fingering isn't slipping off, but it makes the sticks feel a touch too short? This was easily fixed with some cute planet themed joystick nubs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely stunning in person.
reviews.reviewText: I'll admit I was a little afraid when I first saw the box this came in; it was a little plain looking so I was afraid I might have ended up with a super cheap knock off, but I'm so glad I was wrong!This controller is a nice weight in my hands, not to heavy but not too light either; it feels quite nice to hold when playing games. It has all the functions of a brand-name Nintendo pro controller for the Switch (except for an amiibo reader as far as I've seen unless I'm completely missing it on this thing) plus the buttons for Turbo button actions, vibration power, and switching up the color of the lights.Speaking of the lights, it's absolutely GORGEOUS when it's lit up. I'm a sucker for stars, galaxies, and other kinds of prints and lighting so when I saw it was just as vibrant in person with it's rainbow shifting stars against it's pretty black and blue sky paint, I was so happy. There's multiple options for the lights like your typical RGB lighted devices but I like sticking with the original rainbow setting. And after many weeks with it, I can also confirm it does just as good of a job connected to my computer as well as my phone, surprisingly.Overall, I'm absolutely pleased with this purchase and I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a nice switch controller for once those Joy-cons need to charge and might be looking for a pro controller that isn't too expensive. The quality of this controller is amazing for the price I paid and it's been wonderful to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ALOT of bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: I've bought multiple Bluetooth controllers for my switch and hands down this is the best deal I've come across. So good in fact I bought a 2nd one immediately. The glow is super bright and the design is gorgeous. The controller feels perfect and functions well. (We play alot of Mario kart and get joy stick drift every time). Would 100% recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's really pretty! The LEDs rotate the star colors. Beyond cosmetics it works really well. It's battery lasts about 10ish hours. If you have to run away to do chores or anything it automatically turns off, which is nice for parents chasing down toddlers. It doesn't feel cheep or anything like that.I had a problem with powerA controllers just completely dying on me within 3 months of use, with complete battery burnout even though I wasn't playing every day. Will update to see if this has the same issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s so pretty and functional. The size is just right. The buttons and joy sticks feel high quality. The stars are soooo stunning in person and not too bright. Solid controller choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, works well, plug and play
reviews.reviewText: Great little controller. I lost my Switch Pro controller during a move and was so upset. $60 down the drain. I bought this as a replacement, the Joycons are a bit too tiny for my hands, and I was really surprised. It feels like a cheaper alternative (rougher plastic, sortof sticky controls at first) but after using it for a day it seemed to loosen up and proved to be a nice little controller. I beat Hollow Knight in its entirety with it (and beat the alt ending bosses) so I'm gonna give it 5 stars. No drift, no issues with any of the buttons or battery life. Looks beautiful. Great alternative to the Pro controller for like half the price. Would be great for kids or just casual gaming.I still was able to dunk on children in Fortnite with ease and I'm 35 so my life is basically over. 10/10

The media could not be loaded. Ich habe den Controller für meine Kinder besorgt. Wir spielen gerne Mario Kart und die Joycons sind einfach Katastrophe zum spielen. Ich besitze einen Nintendo Pro Controller und einen 8Bito Pro Controller. Ich habe also etwas vergleichbares gesucht, was aber weit weg von 60 - 70 Euro ist. Ich habe diesen für knappe 30€ bekommen und was soll ich sagen, für den Preis ist er nahezu perfekt. Deshalb hier einmal kurz was mir gefällt und was nicht.Positiv:Das wichtigste! Der Controller weckt die Switch zuverlässig und schnell auf. Das ist wunderbar.Sehr gute VerarbeitungErgonomie eines Pro ControllersGuter TastendruckProgrammierbare Backpaddels.Bewegungssteuerung (funktioniert wie es soll)Rumble (ist völlig OK und läst sich einstellen)Die Beleuchtung ist super und lässt sich spielend ändern und auch ausstellen.Negativ:Die Backpaddels sind sehr laut vom Klickgeräusch her.Die Sticks fühlen sich etwas träge an im Vergleich zum Pro oder 8BitoEr fühlt sich etwas kleiner an und etwas zu leicht.(Kann bei Kindern auch in den positiven Abschnitt)Die Turbobelegumg und die Tastenprogrammierung hab ich nicht ausprobiertEs ist ein schöner Controller der den sehr teuren Switch Controllern in nicht viel nachsteht. Ich habe gesehen das er zum Teil für etwa 20 € gehandelt wird und dann ist er definitiv ein absoluter nobrainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Pictures don't do it justice, really impressive lighting and a very comfortable sturdy controller👍

Ich habe einmal einen originalen Pro Controller, einmal einen den hier gezeigten Star-Controller und einmal den NS009-S.Alle liegen gut in der Hand, die Druckpunkte der Knöpfe sind angenehm und die Stickbewegungen werden perfekt angenommen. Mit allen 3 Modellen kann ich die Switch aufwachen lassen. Somit sind die Grundfunktionen gegeben.Die Rumble-Funktion muss ich offen sagen, ist an dem originalen Pro Controller am schönsten, wesentlich feiner als bei den Zubehör Controllern. Bei den Zubehör Controllern ist der Rumble etwas gröber aber nicht störend. Einfach nur anders wie beim Original.Zum Gewicht: Original 246gramm, Lila Star 202gramm und der weiße NS009-S 179gramm. Bezüglich des Gewichts ist das Sternenmodell genau mittig und somit wirklich nicht zu schwer oder zu leicht.Preise: Original 60 bis 70 €, Lila Star knapp über 20€ und der weiße 11,23 über eine andere bekannte günstige Plattform.Meine Kaufempfehlung: Alle 3 sind gut. Entscheidender ist wohl, was möchte man ausgeben. Der weiße Controller ist mein schlechtestes Modell, aber er macht trotzdem Spaß und ist absolut gut spielbar. Würde ihn also auch nochmal kaufen. Der Original Controller: ja, natürlich klare Kaufempfehlung, allerdings auch recht teuer. Der Lila Star: Auch absolute Kaufempfehlung: Druckpunkte sind gut, Rumble funktioniert und ist einstellbar,leider etwas gröber wie beim Original, Beleuchtung funktioniert und ist einstellbar. Weitere Funktionen brauche ich dann auch nicht mehr.Mein Fazit: klarer Favorit ist der Lila Star-Controller, optisch und spielerisch einfach perfekt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works better that either my Xbox or PlayStation controllers which both cost a lot more.If you play games on PC this is great value for money.It has a great feel in the hand, and you can adjust the intensity of the vibration with a tap of a button on the back. You can also change the lighting on the front, which is a nice feature. I was concerned that the lighting on the front might be distracting, however my concerns were unfounded once I started playing.It connects via Bluetooth and it just works. Like, I didn't need to do anything to set it up. And it works great, no lag on input, and the sticks don't seem to have any dead zone.It's sturdy enough that I feel confident giving it to my five year old, though it obviously won't handle being thrown about. That said, it's so cheap if I do have a dark souls related gaming disaster I can replace it.

Ich dachte beim auspacken schon, dass mir das lila ganz gut gefällt und war gespannt wie das jetzt alles klappt und funktioniert.Die Verbindung zur Switch war sofort hergestellt mit allen 4 gekauften Controllern. Es funktioniert alles super. Aber der oberwahnsinn ist die LED Beleuchtung 😍😍😍 - wie kann denn bitte ein Controller sooo schön sein... Die Optik hat mich echt meeeeegast begeistert.Wir haben die im Angebot gekauft für 20,99. Ich kann sie nur empfehlen
